original_text: Then king Rehoboam sent Adoram, who was over the tribute; and all Israel stoned him with stones, that he died. Therefore king Rehoboam made speed to get him up to his chariot, to flee to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 르호보암 왕이 역꾼의 감독 아도람을 보냈더니 온 이스라엘이 그를 돌로 쳐죽인지라 르호보암 왕이 급히 수레에 올라 예루살렘으로 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: and all Israel stoned him with stones,
Therefore king Rehoboam made speed to get him up to his chariot,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 르호보암 왕은 서둘러 그의 전차에 올라타고
